label: insider_threat_05_dx_network_forensics_020
content:
## 2024-09-21 Daily Operations Summary

### Netflow Stats
- Total flows: 8768263
- Unique source IPs: 1525
- Unique destination IPs: 3025
- Average flow duration (sec): 27.3
- Top protocol TCP percentage: 78.0
- Top protocol UDP percentage: 10.0
- ICMP percentage: 1.0
- Long-lived flows greater than 1 hour: 151
- East-West traffic percentage: 65.3

### Dns Query Analysis
- Total queries: 3361307
- Unique domains: 40836
- NXDOMAIN responses: 9457
- DGA suspected domains: 4
- DNS over HTTPS queries: 1813
- Average response time (ms): 5.4
- Cache hit percentage: 91.6
- TXT record queries: 282
- PTR queries: 5625

### Ids Ips Hits
- Total alerts: 801
- Blocked by IPS: 189
- Signature matches: 350
- Anomaly detections: 25
- Severity critical: 2
- Severity high: 9
- Severity medium: 66
- Severity low: 316
- Top signatures:
  - ET EXPLOIT Apache Log4j RCE Attempt
  - ET SCAN SSH Brute Force Attempt
  - ET WEB_SERVER SQL Injection Attempt
- False positive rate percentage: 13.6

### Bandwidth Utilization
- WAN inbound average (Gbps): 3.45
- WAN outbound average (Gbps): 1.67
- WAN peak (Gbps): 6.43
- LAN core utilization percentage: 35.6

- VPN bandwidth (Gbps): 2.33

- Top talker bytes (GB): 22.3

- TLS 1.0 connections: 1
- TLS 1.1 connections: 23

- TLS 1.3 connections: 118916

### Events
- NetFlow anomaly: high volume from 10.20.220.131 — investigated, benign
- BGP route change: AS path prepend from ISP-A — investigated

### Notes
- Network monitoring daily report 2024-09-21. 8768263 flows analyzed. 3361307 DNS queries. 801 IDS alerts (2 critical, 9 high). WAN avg 3.45/1.67 Gbps in/out. 0 BGP announcements.
